Interface for building splash screens based on a progress development.

Version:
$Revision: 1.2 $
Author:
Udo Friedrich

Method Detail

createSplashScreen

public static ISysSplashScreen createSplashScreen(String frameTitle,
                                                  ISysStartInterruptable interruptable,
                                                  String version,
                                                  ISysConfigItem configItem)
                                           throws CSysSplashScreenException
Creates a StartScreen. If an error occurs 'null' is returned.

Parameters:
frameTitle - The title of the splash screen frame.
interruptable - A class that can handle these listeners.
configItem - The item that contains the information for initialising the ISysSplashScreen.
Returns:
the created instance of the ISysSplashScreen or null if the splash screen can not be created.
Throws:
CSysSplashScreenException
